pli-tv-pvr8:1.1_0: Uposathakammassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.2_0: Pavāraṇākammassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.3_0: Tajjanīyakammassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.12_0: upasampadākammassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.13_0: Tajjanīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.14_0: Niyassakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.15_0: Pabbājanīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.16_0: Paṭisāraṇīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.17_0: Ukkhepanīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.18_0: Sativinayassa ko ādi, kiṁ majje, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.19_0: Amūḷhavinayassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.20_0: Tassapāpiyasikāya ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.21_0: Tiṇavatthārakassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.22_0: Bhikkhunovādakasammutiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.23_0: Ticīvarena avippavāsasammutiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.24_0: Santhatasammutiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.25_0: Rūpiyachaḍḍakasammutiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.26_0: Sāṭiyaggāhāpakasammutiyo ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.27_0: Pattaggāhāpakasammutiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.28_0: Daṇḍasammutiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.29_0: Sikkāsammutiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:1.30_0: Daṇḍasikkāsammutiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr8:2.1_0: Uposathakammassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānanti?
pli-tv-pvr8:2.2_0: Uposathakammassa sāmaggī ādi, kiriyā majjhe, niṭṭhānaṁ pariyosānaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr8:3.1_0: Pavāraṇākammassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānanti?
pli-tv-pvr8:3.2_0: Pavāraṇākammassa sāmaggī ādi, kiriyā majjhe, niṭṭhānaṁ pariyosānaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr8:4.1_0: Tajjanīyakammassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānanti?
pli-tv-pvr8:4.2_0: Tajjanīyakammassa vatthu ca puggalo ca ādi, ñatti majjhe, kammavācā pariyosānaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr8:5.8_0: abbhānassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānanti?
pli-tv-pvr8:5.9_0: Abbhānassa vatthu ca puggalo ca ādi, ñatti majjhe, kammavācā pariyosānaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr8:6.1_0: Upasampadākammassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānanti?
pli-tv-pvr8:6.2_0: Upasampadākammassa puggalo ādi, ñatti majjhe, kammavācā pariyosānaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr8:7.1_0: Tajjanīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānanti?
pli-tv-pvr8:7.2_0: Tajjanīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā sammāvattanā ādi, ñatti majjhe, kammavācā pariyosānaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr8:8.4_0: ukkhepanīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānanti?
pli-tv-pvr8:8.5_0: Ukkhepanīyakammassa paṭippassaddhiyā sammāvattanā ādi, ñatti majjhe, kammavācā pariyosānaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr8:9.1_0: Sativinayassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānanti?
pli-tv-pvr8:9.2_0: Sativinayassa vatthu ca puggalo ca ādi, ñatti majjhe, kammavācā pariyosānaṁ.
pli-tv-pvr8:10.12_0: daṇḍasikkāsammutiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānanti?
pli-tv-pvr8:10.13_0: Daṇḍasikkāsammutiyā vatthu ca puggalo ca ādi, ñatti majjhe, kammavācā pariyosānaṁ.
